title: Ordnance Survey map font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131708im_/http:/typophile.com/files/joelStreet_5898.jpg)
  
This typeface used to be used on UK Ordnance Survey maps - As far as I know they don't use it now, but they did in the recent past.

Thanks

Font: 

 Autodesk Proxy1 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131708/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: steve_p

comments.content:
Your sample matches the following Autodesk Inc. fonts (1996) :  
Txt, Monotxt, Proxy 1, Proxy 2 [...] Proxy 9
